document_data.name: Caxal
document_data.History:
Caxal was a cautious ruler, who wanted no intrusion from the temples.

In [[1361 DR]], when many of his people witnessed the arrival of the [[Golden Legion]]'s ships, he quickly called a war council with the leader of the [[Jaguar Knights]], [[Gultec]], and the leader of the [[Eagle Knights (Maztica)|Eagle Knights]], [[Lok]]. Together with Lok and Gultec, Caxal decided to face the invaders at [[Ulatos]]. Caxal submitted himself and his city to [[Cordell]] immediately after the Golden Legion's easy victory.

At [[1362 DR]] Caxal was reduced to be a figurehead of governor Cordell.

In 1362 he tried to convince the adventuring party hired by [[Drakosa]] to find the [[Cloak of One Plume]] to instead gave to him it after recovered.
[[Hasoctl]] secretly worked for him.
